Html:
Hi!

I have a short question: What does "Make imported updates language-Independent" mean?

I want to import updates from Adobe Reader 11 catalog. We are using a German Windows 7 with German Adobe Reader 11.

best regards

Hi,

some catalogs (Dell f.i.) are designed for English language updates only. But if your WSUS is configured to only have German Language Updates, you can't publish and/or deploy "English" Updates. So this checkbox just does, as it says, it removes the assigned language from the catalog updates. I usually have it checked.

HTH
Norbert
